option.edit_format_params: list=List Mode (shows vertical list of links) dropdown=Dropdown Mode (uses chosen.js)

above|body=Above All Content below|body=Below All Content above|page_container_content_top=Above Content Container below|page_container_content_top=Below Content Container above|ad_above_top_breadcrumb=Above Top Breadcrumb Ads below|ad_below_top_breadcrumb=Below Top Breadcrumb Ads above|page_container_breadcrumb_top=Above Top Breadcrumbs below|page_container_breadcrumb_top=Below Top Breadcrumbs above|page_container_notices=Above Notices Container below|page_container_notices=Below Notices Container above|page_container_content_title_bar=Above Content Title Bar below|page_container_content_title_bar=Below Content Title Bar above|page_container_sidebar=Top Of Sidebar below|page_container_sidebar=Bottom Of Sidebar above|page_container_breadcrumb_bottom=Above Bottom Breadcrumbs below|page_container_breadcrumb_bottom=Below Bottom Breadcrumbs

phrases.phrase: You can't use an availability higher than 1 if you are also allowing bids
Your bid must be higher than the current bid
The buyout price is too low
You cannot buy your own auctions
You can not reject bids on expired auctions
You can only reject winning bids
You selected a date that is in the past
Please enter an availability higher than zero
Action not allowed on this type of auction
Unfortunately someone else has bought the auction you were bidding on.
The minimum bid is too low
You have to select either a bid or a buyout value
Enter the ID of the user that will be used to send auction notifications. Note that this user should NOT participate in any other part of the auctions (eg. bidding, buying and creating auctions).
How you want tags to be shown, if you expect to have a large amount of tags it's best to select "Dropdown Mode"
Enter the prefixes that should trigger or prevent the widget (see Display Mode option above). Separate by new line.

Once enabled, place the following code in your templates where you want the widget to appear:
<xen:include template="auction_widget" />
Whitelist mode will only show the widget on pages that match the prefixes defined below, whereas Blacklist mode will show the widget on all pages EXCEPT the ones defined below.
Choose the template hook where the auction widget should be placed

Unfortunately, you have been outbid on [url='{link}']{title}[/url].
The new top bid is: ${top_bid}.
Please confirm that you want to reject the following bid
You are trying to buy a higher quantity than there is available
Could not find the requested auction
Could not find the requested sale
The confirmation message to be send to the winner of the auction when you archive the relevant auction. You can use the following tags: {username}, {title}, {link}, {price}, {quantity}
Enter the address that purchasers are supposed to send their payments to.
You have not placed any bids
You have not placed any buyouts
You have not made any sales yet

templates.template:
<xen:require css="auction_bid.css" />
<xen:title>{xen:phrase bidding_on_x, 'title={$auction.title}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link 'auction-bid/bid', '', 'id={$auction.auction_id}'}">{xen:phrase place_bid}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'auction-bid/place-bid', '', 'id={$auction.auction_id}'}" class="xenForm formOverlay auctionBid auctionForm" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{$auction.auction_id}"/>
<input type="hidden" class="min_bid" value="{xen:if $auction.top_bid, {xen:calc '{$auction.top_bid} + 1'}, $auction.min_bid}"/>
<xen:include template="auction_details_content" />
<fieldset class="bid"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase your_bid}:</dt> <dd> $ <input type="text" name="bid" value="{xen:if $auction.top_bid, {xen:calc '{$auction.top_bid} + 1'}, $auction.min_bid}" class="textCtrl autoSize" size="20" maxlength="10" /> </dd> </dl>
</fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase place_bid}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
</form>
<script type="text/javascript"><!-- new XenAuction.Bid; //--></script>

<xen:require css="auction_bid.css" />
<xen:title>{xen:phrase buying_x, 'title={$auction.title}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link 'auction-bid/buyout', '', 'id={$auction.auction_id}'}">{xen:phrase buy_now}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'auction-bid/place-buyout', '', 'id={$auction.auction_id}'}" class="xenForm formOverlay auctionBid auctionForm" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> <input type="hidden" name="id" value="{$auction.auction_id}"/>
<input type="hidden" class="cost" value="{$auction.buy_now}"/> <input type="hidden" class="availability" value="{$auction.availability}"/>
<xen:include template="auction_details_content" />
<fieldset class="bid"> <xen:if is="{$auction.availability} > 1"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase quantity}:</dt> <dd> <input type="text" name="quantity" value="1" class="textCtrl autoSize" size="20" maxlength="10" /> </dd> </dl> <xen:else/> <input type="hidden" name="quantity" value="1" /> </xen:if> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase availability}:</dt> <dd> {$auction.availability} </dd> </dl> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt>{xen:phrase paying}:</dt> <dd class="paying"> ${$auction.buy_now} </dd> </dl>
</fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase buy_now}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
</form>
<script type="text/javascript"><!-- new XenAuction.Bid; //--></script>
